word_mean: 恢复(期)，康复(期)：在发病、外科手术和受伤后之恢复过程

sentence.Network_en: You need four to six weeks' convalescence.
sentence.Network_cn: 你需要四至六个星期的康复期。

sentence.Network_en: She bore up well during her convalescence.
sentence.Network_cn: 她在病后恢复期间始终有信心.

sentence.Network_en: After convalescence he had a relapse.
sentence.Network_cn: 他于痊愈之后,病又发作了一次.

entry.def: Convalescence is the period or process of becoming healthy and well again after an illness or operation.

means.word_mean: 1. gradual healing (through rest) after sickness or injury

auth_sentence.content: The accident and the convalescence seemed to have changed him.
auth_sentence.res_content: The accident and the convalescence seemed to have changed him.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The accident and the convalescence seemed to have changed him.

auth_sentence.content: He spent much of his convalescence questioning his involvement in politics.
auth_sentence.res_content: He spent much of his convalescence questioning his involvement in politics.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He spent much of his convalescence questioning his involvement in politics.

auth_sentence.content: This is a time of convalescence when you need your rest and nutrition and physical activity and social support.
auth_sentence.res_content: This is a time of convalescence when you need your rest and nutrition and physical activity and social support.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: This is a time of convalescence when you need your rest and nutrition and physical activity and social support.

stems_affixes.word_buile: equi+val价值+ent……的,也表示物→同等价值
equi平等+val价值+ence表名词→同等价值

stems_affixes.value_cn: 有效性, 合法性, 正确性

con全部+val强壮+escence开始……→全身开始强壮起来→恢复健康
equi+val价值+ent……的,也表示物→同等价值
val强壮+or表名词→n.英勇, 勇猛
